searchSql.baseSql:
SELECT MTYPEAMOUNT.LOANTYPE AS MLOANTYPE, SUM(MTYPEAMOUNT.COM_AMOUNT) AS MCOMAMOUNT, SUM(MTYPEAMOUNT.PRF_AMOUNT) AS MPRFAMOUNT FROM (SELECT T.PKID, T.CASE_CODE, T.PROPERTY_ADDR, T.MORT_TYPE_OLD, T.FIN_ORG_NAME, T.FIN_ORG_NAME_YC,--支行名称 T.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE,--分行code T.FIN_ORG_CODE,--支行code T.FENHANG,--分行名称 T.CUST_NAME, T.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT, T.COM_AMOUNT, T.PRF_AMOUNT, T.SIGN_DATE, T.LEND_DATE, T.APPR_DATE, T.REAL_NAME, T.ORG_NAME, T.ORG_ORG_NAME, T.IS_TMP_BANK, T.SDSTATUS, T.LOAN_AGENT, T.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM, T.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI, T.LOANTYPE FROM (select c.pkid, p.property_addr, m.case_code, m.mort_type as MORT_TYPE_OLD, (Select FO.FIN_ORG_NAME from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FO where FO.FIN_ORG_CODE=m.fin_org_code) FIN_ORG_NAME, (Select FOYC.FIN_ORG_NAME_YC from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FOYC where FOYC.FIN_ORG_CODE=m.fin_org_code) FIN_ORG_NAME_YC, (Select FOCODE.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG FOCODE where FOCODE.FIN_ORG_CODE=m.fin_org_code)FA_FIN_ORG_CODE, (select TOP 1 FIN_ORG_NAME_YC from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in ( select distinct FA_FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_FIN_ORG where FIN_ORG_CODE in(select FIN_ORG_CODE from sctrans.T_TS_SUP ts where ts.SUP_CAT='0' and ts.FIN_ORG_CODE=m.FIN_ORG_CODE))) FENHANG, m.FIN_ORG_CODE, m.cust_name, ISNULL(m.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,0)/10000 MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT,--总金额 ISNULL(m.COM_AMOUNT,0)/10000 COM_AMOUNT, ISNULL(m.PRF_AMOUNT,0)/10000 PRF_AMOUNT, m.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI, m.SIGN_DATE, m.LEND_DATE, m.APPR_DATE,--批贷时间 m.LOAN_AGENT,--贷款专员id m.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM,----贷款专员组织id (SELECT top 1 uj.real_name from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB uj where uj.USER_ID=M.LOAN_AGENT) REAL_NAME, (SELECT top 1 uu.org_name from SCTRANS.V_USER_ORG_JOB uu where uu.ORG_ID=M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM) ORG_NAME, (select top 1 org2.ORG_NAME orgName1 from sctrans.sys_org org1 left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj on org1.ID=uoj.ORG_ID left join sctrans.V_USER_ORG_JOB uoj1 on org1.PARENT_ID=uoj1.ORG_ID left join sctrans.SYS_ORG org2 on org2.ID=uoj1.ORG_ID where org1.PARENT_ID in ( 'FF5BC56E0E4B45289DAA5721A494C7C5', '8a8493d453141f3301532c9568011af9', 'd5878adf8b0c4032aeae895c701ed693', 'de81a98a8ec341caa8e9bc77c46cd370', '54b3233fdf994d9987e7c8febc223588', '960089538bc54a9a9139ef52ceb45b33', '6114AB949B4445828D4383977C4FAC71', '6a84979158b942b78a8a5921cc30b8c3') and org1.ID=M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM) ORG_ORG_NAME,
(CASE m.IS_TMP_BANK WHEN '1' THEN '是' WHEN '0' THEN '否' END) IS_TMP_BANK, case when c.LOAN_REQ=1 and (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016001','30016002') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=1 then '否' when c.LOAN_REQ=1 and (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016001','30016002') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=0 then '是' when c.LOAN_REQ=1 and (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016003') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=1 then '公' end SDSTATUS, case when (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016001','30016002') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=1 then '1' when (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016003') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=1 then '2' when (select TOP 1 M.MORT_TYPE from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1) in('30016001','30016002') and (select TOP 1 M.IS_DELEGATE_YUCUI from SCTRANS.T_TO_MORTGAGE M where c.case_code=m.CASE_CODE AND M.IS_ACTIVE=1)=0 then '3' end LOANTYPE
from sctrans.T_TO_MORTGAGE m left join sctrans.T_TO_PROPERTY_INFO p on m.case_code = p.case_code left join sctrans.T_TO_CASE c on m.case_code = c.case_code where c.LOAN_REQ=1 AND m.is_active = '1' <ifNotNull idflag> AND M.LOAN_AGENT = #userId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull queryorgs> AND M.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM in (#queryorgs#) </ifNotNull> )T where T.SDSTATUS IS NOT NULL AND T.LOANTYPE IS NOT NULL AND 1=1
<ifNotNull signTimeStart> and T.SIGN_DATE >= #signTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull signTimeEnd> and T.SIGN_DATE <= #signTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull lendTimeStart> and T.LEND_DATE >= #lendTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull lendTimeEnd> and T.LEND_DATE <= #lendTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull apprTimeStart> and T.APPR_DATE >= #apprTimeStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull apprTimeEnd> and T.APPR_DATE <= #apprTimeEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull comAmountStart> and T.COM_AMOUNT >= #comAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull comAmountEnd> and T.COM_AMOUNT <= #comAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull mortTotalAmountStart> and T.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT >= #mortTotalAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull mortTotalAmountEnd> and T.MORT_TOTAL_AMOUNT <= #mortTotalAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull prfAmountStart> and T.PRF_AMOUNT >= #prfAmountStart# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull prfAmountEnd> and T.PRF_AMOUNT <= #prfAmountEnd# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull isTempBank> and T.IS_TMP_BANK = #isTempBank# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull loanLostFinOrgNameCode> and T.FA_FIN_ORG_CODE = #loanLostFinOrgNameCode# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull loanLostFinOrgNameYcCode> and T.FIN_ORG_CODE = #loanLostFinOrgNameYcCode# </ifNotNull>
<ifNotNull isLose> and T.SDSTATUS = #isLose# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull processorOrgId> and T.REAL_NAME = #processorOrgId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull organizeOrgId> and T.LOAN_AGENT_TEAM = #organizeOrgId# </ifNotNull> <ifNotNull loanType> and T.LOANTYPE = #loanType# </ifNotNull> ) AS MTYPEAMOUNT
